englishTranslationText:
Indeed	 in	 this	 are	 signs	 for	 people	 who	
perceive.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak is	 meiñ	 nishaniyañ	 haiñ	 firāsat	
wāloñ	ke	liye

englishTranslationText:
And	indeed	 that	 township	is	upon	a	road	
still	in	use
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	be-shak		woh	basti	us	rāh	par	hai	jo	ab	
tak	chalti	hai

englishTranslationText: Indeed	in	this	are	signs	for	the	believers.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak	 	 us	 meiñ	 nishāniyañ	 haiñ	 imān	
wāloñ	ko

englishTranslationText:
And	 indeed	 the	 Dwellers	 of	 the	 Woods	
were	unjust.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	be-shak jhādi	wāle	zaroor	ƶālim	they

englishTranslationText:
We	therefore	took	revenge	from	them;	and	
indeed	both	 these	 townships	are	situated	
on	an	open	road.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	ham	ne	un	se	badlā	liyā	aur	be-shak		yeh	
donoñ	bastiyāñ	khule	rāste	par	padti	haiñ

englishTranslationText:
And	 the	people	of	 the	Hijr	(rocks)	denied	
the	Noble	Messengers.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 be-shak hijr	 wāloñ	 ne	 Rasooloñ	 ko	
jhutlāyā

englishTranslationText:
And	 We	 gave	 them	 Our	 signs,	 and	 they	
remained	averse	to	them.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	ham	ne	un	ko	apni	nishāniyāñ	diñ	 to	
woh	un	se	muñh	phere	rahe

arabicText: وَكَانُوا۟ يَنْحِتُونَ مِنَ ٱلْجِبَالِ بُيُوتًا ءَامِنِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 they	 used	 to	 carve	 dwellings	 in	 the	
hills,	without	fear
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	woh	pahādoñ	meiñ	ghar	tarāshte	they	
be	khauf

englishTranslationText: So	the	scream	overcame	them	at	morning.
romanUrduTranslationText: To	unheñ	subah	hote	chinghād	ne	āaliya

arabicText: فَمَآ أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Therefore	 their	 earnings	 did	 not	 in	 the	
least	benefit	them.
romanUrduTranslationText: To	un	ki	kamāi	kuchh un	ke	kām	na	āayi

arabicText: وَمَا خَلَقْنَا ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَآ إِلَّا بِٱلْحَقِّ ۗ وَإِنَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ لَـَٔاتِيَةٌۭ ۖ فَٱصْفَحِ ٱلصَّفْحَ ٱلْجَمِيلَ
englishTranslationText:
And	We	have	not	created	the	heavens	and	the	earth	and	all	that	is	between	them,	except	with	the	
Truth;	and	indeed	 the	 Last	Day	will	 come,	 therefore	(O	 dear	 Prophet	Muhammad	- peace	 and	
blessings	be	upon	him),	forbear	graciously
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	ham	ne	āasmān aur	zamin	aur	jo	kuchh		
in	ke	darmiyān	hai	‘abas	(bekār)	na	banāyā	aur	be-shak qiyāmat	āane	wāli	hai	to	tum	achchhi	
ṭarah	dar	guzar	karo

englishTranslationText: Indeed	your	Lord	only	is	the	Great	Creator,	the	All	Knowing.
romanUrduTranslationText: Be-shak		tumhārā	Rab	hi	bahut	paidā	karne	wālā	jānne	wālā	hai

arabicText: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَـٰكَ سَبْعًۭا مِّنَ ٱلْمَثَانِى وَٱلْقُرْءَانَ ٱلْعَظِيمَ
englishTranslationText: And	indeed	We	have	given	you	seven	verses	that	are	repeated,	and	the	great	Qur’an
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	be-shak		ham	ne	tum	ko	sāt	āayateñ	diñ	jo	dohrāyi	jāti	haiñ	aur	‘azmat	wālā	Qur'ān.

arabicText: لَا تَمُدَّنَّ عَيْنَيْكَ إِلَىٰ مَا مَتَّعْنَا بِهِۦٓ أَزْوَٰجًۭا مِّنْهُمْ وَلَا تَحْزَنْ عَلَيْهِمْ وَٱخْفِضْ جَنَاحَكَ لِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Do	not	direct	your	eyes	towards	the	things	We	have	given	to	some	of	their	couples	to	enjoy,	and	
do	not	at	all	grieve	because	of	them,	and	take	the	Muslims	within	the	folds	of	your	mercy.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Apni	āañkh	uthā	kar	us	chiz	ko	na	dekho	jo	ham	ne	un	ke	kuchh		jodoñ	ko	baratne	ko	di	aur	un	kā	
kuchh		gham	na	khāo	aur	musalmānoñ	ko	apne	rahmat		ke	paroñ	meiñ	le	lo

englishTranslationText: And	proclaim,	“Indeed	I,	yes	I,	am	the	clear	Herald of	Warning.”
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	farmāo	ke	maiñ	hi	hooñ	sāf	Dar	sunāne	wālā	(us	‘aƶāb	se).

englishTranslationText: (Of	a	punishment)	Like	the	one	We	sent	down	upon	the	dividers.
romanUrduTranslationText: Jaisā Ham	ne	bāñtne	wāloñ	par	utārā.

englishTranslationText:
Those	 who	 broke	 the	Word	 of	Allah into	
several	parts.	( Those who broke the Torah 
/ Bible or changed its text - or those who 
called the Qur’an a fabrication / poetry.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jinhoñ	 ne	Kalām-e-Ilāhi	 ko	 tikke	 boti	 kar	
liyā

englishTranslationText:
Therefore,	by	your	Lord,	We	shall	question	
every	one	of	them
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	 tumhāre	Rab	ki	qasam	ham	zaroor	un	
sab	se	poocheñ	ge

englishTranslationText: About	all	what	they	used to	do.
romanUrduTranslationText: Jo	kuchh woh	karte	they

arabicText: فَٱصْدَعْ بِمَا تُؤْمَرُ وَأَعْرِضْ عَنِ ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Therefore	publicly	announce	what	you	are	
commanded,	 and	 turn	 away	 from	 the	
polytheists.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	 ‘alāniyah	 kah	 do	 jis	 bāt	 kā	 tumheñ	
hukm	hai	aur	mushrikoñ	se	muñh	pher	lo

arabicText: فَٱصْدَعْ بِمَا تُؤْمَرُ وَأَعْرِضْ عَنِ ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Therefore	publicly	announce	what	you	are	
commanded,	 and	 turn	 away	 from	 the	
polytheists.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	 ‘alāniyah	 kah	 do	 jis	 bāt	 kā	 tumheñ	
hukm	hai	aur	mushrikoñ	se	muñh	pher	lo

englishTranslationText:
Indeed	 We	 suffice	 you	 against	 these	
mockers.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak		un	hañsne	wāloñ	par	ham	tumheñ	
kifāyat	karte	haiñ

arabicText: ٱلَّذِينَ يَجْعَلُونَ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَ ۚ فَسَوْفَ يَعْلَمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Those	who	ascribe	another	God	along	with	
Allah;	so	they	will	soon	come	to	know.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jo	Allāh	ke	sāth	doosrā	m’abood	 thahrāte	
haiñ	to	ab	jān	jāyeñ	ge

arabicText: ٱلَّذِينَ يَجْعَلُونَ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَ ۚ فَسَوْفَ يَعْلَمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Those	who	ascribe	another	God	along	with	
Allah;	so	they	will	soon	come	to	know.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jo	Allāh	ke	sāth	doosrā	m’abood	 thahrāte	
haiñ	to	ab	jān	jāyeñ	ge

arabicText: وَلَقَدْ نَعْلَمُ أَنَّكَ يَضِيقُ صَدْرُكَ بِمَا يَقُولُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 indeed	 We	 know	 that	 you	 are
disheartened	by	their	speech.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	be-shak		Hameñ	m’aloom	hai	ke	un	ki	
bātoñ	se	tum	dil	tang	hote	ho

arabicText: فَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلسَّـٰجِدِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Therefore	proclaim	the	Purity	of	your	Lord	
with	praise,	and	be	of	those	who	prostrate.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	 apne	 Rab	 ko	 sarāhte	 huye	 us	 ki	 pāki	
bolo	aur	sajde	wāloñ	meiñ	ho

englishTranslationText:
And	keep	worshipping	your	Lord,	till	death	
*	comes	to	you.	(*	The	certainty.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 marte	 dam	 tak	 apne	 Rab	 ki	 ìbādat	
meiñ	raho

arabicText: أَتَىٰٓ أَمْرُ ٱللَّهِ فَلَا تَسْتَعْجِلُوهُ ۚ سُبْحَـٰنَهُۥ وَتَعَـٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
englishTranslationText:
The	command	of	Allah is	arriving	soon,therefore	do	not	seek	to	hasten	it;	Purity	and	Supremacy	
are	to	Him,	above	all	the	partners	they ascribe.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Ab	āatā	hai	Allāh	kā	hukm	to	us	ki	jaldi	na	
karo	 pāki	 aur	 bartari	 hai	 usey un	 ke	
shārikoñ	se

arabicText: يُنَزِّلُ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةَ بِٱلرُّوحِ مِنْ أَمْرِهِۦ عَلَىٰ مَن يَشَآءُ مِنْ عِبَادِهِۦٓ أَنْ أَنذِرُوٓا۟ أَنَّهُۥ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّآ أَنَا۠ فَٱتَّقُونِ
englishTranslationText:
He	sends	down	the	angels	with	the	soul	of	faith	- the	divine	revelations	- towards	those	among	
His	bondmen	He	wills	that,	“There	is	no	worship	except	for	Me,	therefore	fear	Me.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Malāika	ko	Imān	ki	jān	y’ani	Waḥi	le	kar	apne	jin	bandoñ	par	chāhe	utārtā	hai	ke	dar	sunāo	ke	
mere	siwā	kisi	ki	bandagi	nahiñ	to	mujh	se	daro
